name: solana-balance-statusbar
description: View Solana balance in VSCode's statusbar

solanaBalance.walletPath.description: Path to the Solana wallet file

solanaBalance.updateInterval.description: Update interval in seconds. Note: Setting this too low may impact performance.

solanaBalance.displayFormat.description: Display format for the status bar.

solanaCliInfo.description: This extension requires the Solana CLI to be installed. For installation instructions, visit: https://docs.solanalabs.com/cli/install
